channel.title: Nori on Theo's lab
channel.description: Recent content in Nori on Theo's lab

item.title: Nori Analyzer and Elk Stack
item.description: Recently, Elasticsearch announced its Korean analyzer nori. I test it using docker compose. Install Docker CE $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common $ curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - $ sudo add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs)\ stable" $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.
